src:
Hong Kong police fire tear gas in standoff with protesters

03 Nov 2019, 14:17

HONG KONG (Reuters) - Hong Kong police fired tear gas in a violent standoff with protesters in the eastern suburb of Taikoo Shing in which a local politician had his ear partly bitten off.
Editing by Jason Neely
